methods.name: <init>

params.name: groupPath
params.comment: group path of the affected Module or Fragment

params.name: treeName
params.comment: name of the tree where group exists

params.name: blockModelService
params.comment: service that has the known block models

params.name: modelName
params.comment: name of the model to use

methods.name: createFragment
methods.comment:
Create a fragment with the name as the name of the given block; append a
 one-up number if we get a DuplicateNameException.

methods.name: createModule
methods.comment:
Create a fragment with the name as the name of the given block; append a
 one-up number if we get a DuplicateNameException.

methods.name: moveCodeUnits
methods.comment: Method moveCodeUnits. Moves the code units into a Fragment

params.name: fragment
params.comment: the Fragment where the code units are moved to.

params.name: block
params.comment: the CodeBlock containing the code to be moved.

params.name: monitor
params.comment: the TaskMonitor to allow for cancelling.

name: SubroutineModelCmd
comment:
Command that organizes a Module or Fragment according to a specified block
 model. This organization produces a "flat" (single layer) partitioning.

fields.name: PROGRAM_CHANGED_MESSAGE
fields.constant_value: "Organize algorithm did not run: Program Tree has changed since the algorithm was scheduled."
